channel.title: CVE Feed for Pepperl+Fuchs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pepperl+Fuchs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12500|2024-09-17T01:10:49.072Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- p%2Bf%20comtrol%20rocketlinx
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) allows unauthenticated device administration.

item.title: CVE-2020-12503|2024-09-17T04:24:41.310Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- p%2Bf%20comtrol%20rocketlinx
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) and ICRL-M-8RJ45/4SFP-G-DIN, ICRL-M-16RJ45/4CP-G-DIN FW 1.2.3 and below is prone to multiple authenticated command injections.

item.title: CVE-2024-5849|2024-08-13T12:32:37.130Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- icdm-rx%2Ftcp-db9%2Frj45-din
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker may use a reflected XSS vulnerability to obtain information from a user or reboot the affected device once.

item.title: CVE-2024-38502|2024-08-13T13:28:24.550Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- icdm-rx%2Ftcp-db9%2Frj45-din
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker may use stored XSS vulnerability to obtain information from a user or reboot the affected device once.

item.title: CVE-2024-38501|2024-08-13T13:31:52.009Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- icdm-rx%2Ftcp-db9%2Frj45-din
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker may use a HTML injection vulnerability with limited length to inject malicious HTML code and gain low-privileged access on the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-6422|2024-07-23T18:31:29.464Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- oit1500-f113-b12-cb
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can manipulate the device via Telnet, stop processes, read, delete and change data.

item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can manipulate the device via Telnet, stop processes, read, delete and change data.

item.title: CVE-2024-6421|2024-07-10T07:36:52.119Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- oit1500-f113-b12-cb
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can read out sensitive device information through a incorrectly configured FTP service.

item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can read out sensitive device information through a incorrectly configured FTP service.
